content: Singaporean politician **Shawn Loh Shou-En**[a] is a Singaporean politician and civil servant, who was elected to the [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore) in the [2025 general election](/wiki/2025_Singaporean_general_election). He represents the [Jalan Besar Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Jalan_Besar_Group_Representation_Constituency) as a member of the [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party). ## Career Loh joined the [Ministry of Finance](/wiki/Ministry_of_Finance_(Singapore)) (MOF) in June 2023 and was the director of security and resilience programmes at MOF. He was the Budget director for 2024 and 2025. Loh resigned from the MOF in March 2025, sparking speculation that he would contest in the [2025 Singaporean general election](/wiki/2025_Singaporean_general_election). In April, Loh was spotted in a Jalan Besar event led by Minister [Josephine Teo](/wiki/Josephine_Teo) and was eventually confirmed to replace retiring Senior Minister of State of Defence [Heng Chee How](/wiki/Heng_Chee_How). His team would proceed to win with 75% of the vote. ## Personal life Loh is married with four children. ## Notes [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)Preceded by[Denise Phua](/wiki/Denise_Phua) [Josephine Teo](/wiki/Josephine_Teo) [Heng Chee How](/wiki/Heng_Chee_How) [Wan Rizal](/wiki/Wan_Rizal) **[Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_Parliament) for [Jalan Besar GRC](/wiki/Jalan_Besar_GRC)** 2025â€“ present Served alongside: **[Denise Phua](/wiki/Denise_Phua), [Josephine Teo](/wiki/Josephine_Teo), [Wan Rizal](/wiki/Wan_Rizal)****Incumbent** This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Shawn Loh
